author: GothamResearch
content: Our question for $EIGI is very simple: Did you or did you not deliberately attract suspect customers from the internet underground?

author: GothamResearch
content: We spoke in hypothetical terms in our $EIGI report... follow-up will depend on how the company answers our simple question. Come clean.

author: GothamResearch
content: Home Capital Group, Blinkx & Lumber Liquidator's growth came on the back of illicit/unethical/illegal activities. You think $EIGI different?

author: GothamResearch
content: $EIGI CFO quits his role. EIGI hires former Lightsquared employee as CFO (Lightsquared the Phil Falcone company)

author: GothamResearch
content: $EIGI new CFO hails from the same Lightsquared that filed for bankruptcy. Recall that $EIGI has significant debt... coincidence?
